name: Versus Round 1
description:
Versus Fighters

The fighters from the Versus game will hail from different Independently published comicbooks. There are over 20 publishers signed on to the game with a variety of different character types ranging from your super types, magic based characters to your street brawlers. All with unique attributes and abilities.

Every purchase will go to adding additional stages, servers for multiplay  and characters.  So help support this indie driven project by purchasing the project and sharing with your friends and family.
